Today, I voted to convict President Trump on two articles of impeachment. It gives me no pleasure to conclude that he is guilty of the offenses laid out in the trial.

Sadly, we have a president who sees himself as above the law and is ignorant or indifferent to the Constitution.

Democrats cooked up two articles of impeachment to accomplish their goal and even attempt to prevent future ballot access. This has been a flagrant abuse of power by the U.S. House, and it took the Senate to end this charade.

My brothers look at things and say, “That’s not right.” The question is how do those guys get off the hook. The answer? Corruption. If we make that case in 2020, and fight against the most corrupt president in history, that’s how we win. #WarrenTownHall
